channel.title: career on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in career on Memo Tut

item.title: What do you do for data analysis, after all?
item.description: # Goals for this article Each person has different timing to meet data analysis. Depending on when you met each other, your position in data analysis will change. What is data analysis for me, and how do you intend to get involved? I hope that while reading the example of myself, who is just a science student, the readers will also have the opportunity to ask themselves. #Overview of the article ・Goal of this article ・Until ordinary science students become data analysis personnel ・What is data analysis for me?
